en module (:container [complexe structuur]: list: leaf ) is een onderdeel van en YANG Data model
Module _
	|_ container_
		     |_ list_
			     |_leafs

	Example Definition

Title: Student System Information
Description: Simple Form to collect names, emails, systeminfo, Feedback.

Section 1: Personal information
Q1: Full Name (short anw)
Q2: Email address (Not null)

Section 2: System information
Q1: Name|
Q2: Model
Q3: OS 
Q4: OS-version 
Q5: CPU 
Q6: RAM 
Q7: Max storage capacity

Section 3: Feedback
Q1: Do you want to receive updates? (checkbox)
Options: Yes, send me updates


	Convert to JSON

{
      "title": "Student System Information",
      "description": "Simple Form to collect names, emails, system info, and feedback.",
      "items": [
        // Section 1: Personal Information
        { "title": "Full Name", "type": "SHORT_ANSWER", "required": true },
        { "title": "Email Address", "type": "SHORT_ANSWER", "required": true },

        // Section 2: System Information
        { "title": "System Name", "type": "SHORT_ANSWER", "required": true },
        { "title": "Model", "type": "SHORT_ANSWER", "required": true },
        { "title": "Operating System", "type": "SHORT_ANSWER", "required": true },
        { "title": "OS Version", "type": "SHORT_ANSWER" },
        { "title": "CPU", "type": "SHORT_ANSWER" },
        { "title": "RAM", "type": "SHORT_ANSWER" },
        { "title": "Max Storage Capacity", "type": "SHORT_ANSWER" },

        // Section 3: Feedback
        { "title": "Do you want to receive updates?", "type": "CHECKBOXES",
          "options": ["Yes, send me updates"] }
      ]
    };
